summary: Excellent investment 6 units apartment at affordable price, Located at the heart of Korea Town, walkers' paradise: close to Downtown, Beverly Hills n Hollywood. 2bed 1bath X 5units, 1bed 1ba X 1unit, Long term, good tenants, 8 parking space, 2nd floor unit has a view of Hollywood mountains. Original condition, defered maintenance, price to sell, to be Sold As-Is, with current tenants, no repair, no termite, Motivated seller. Please  do not walk in to the property, drive by only, No for sale sign on the property. subject to inspection upon accepted offer. Thank you.  Continue reading

*  *  *  * Beautiful luxury 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms ( one of the most well built, great floor plan condo) in LA. This condo located in between Korea -town and Down-town LA. Very convenient location for all, Located close to Koreatown and Downtown LA, Stable center, LA Live, HWY 110,shops, restaurants, and entertainment. .. much more. Built in 2009, very spacious living room w/ elegant Hardwood floors, large LA down town view balcony. Bright and airy unit. This condo offers high ceiling, recess lights, spacious modern kitchen has granite counter w many custom cabinets, Stainless steel appliances, marble floors. Separate washer, dryer room. Large master bedroom w/ walk-in closets, large bathroom w/ bath tub, separate glass door shower, down town LA view balcony . Large second bedroom has mirrored closet, large window. Amenities included Fitness center, community room  &  24-hour security cameras. Very bright , airy. You will love this condo. Must see.  Continue reading

High Rents and Low Hassle!  Photos show quality of rehab. Property better than competition for two reasons. First, massive scope of rehab means City inspections recently completed for New Heaters, New Plumbing, New Electrical, New framing, New Roof, New Stucco, and New Appliances, in addition to normal cosmetic upgrades you see elsewhere like new flooring and paint. This translates to peace of mind for decades to come. Second, sold without possession or leases!  This means ALL THREE units can get Fair Market Value right away. No inheriting old tenants paying $500/mo like some properties. Local property managers estimate $6,000 up to $7,000 per month in rent! Downstairs is 3 bed (modeled as 2+dining but previously used as 3rd bed) + bath. Two units up. One unit up has 2+1.  Second unit up has 1 bedroom and bath on main floor, + 1 bedroom in attic + 400SF additional living space in attic. Attic space may not be permitted. HPOZ. Must see to appreciate. Will go fast Continue reading

4 unit building close to the heart of Korea town. This consist of a 4 bed and 2 baths. Two units of 1 bed and 1 bath and a single with a bath. Close to USC, Coliseum and Downtown. Units are fully occupied by long time tenants. Parking space for up to 6 cars. Easy access to the 10 FWY and the 110 FWY. Great property for an investors or buyer that wants to invest on passive income and revenue on this exclusive area. This is an R3 zone with 5903 sq ft of land . With possible space for expansion. Property to be sold as is.  Continue reading

Long term tenants with under market rent but value add opportunity to make this property a cash cow trophy property. Centrally located to Downtown Los Angeles, schools, &  shopping. Won't last !!!
